title: honor lv 5
body: i get honor lv5 but i dont get gift honor lv 5? XD why ?

replies.body: I think you might be thinking of the updated Honor System where all the rewards are directly tied to ranking up. Before this change, honor capsules were given randomly by playing games, and you wouldn't necessarily have gotten one automatically for hitting rank 5 I believe.

What exactly are you referring to? You get an honor flair for your next game when you get honored. You aren't guaranteed to get something just for ranking up, but at different honor ranks, you unlock access to rewards. One of the good upcoming rewards for having Honor 5 is getting a higher step up in Honor 2 when it gets reset for the next season. It looks like next season has some [guaranteed rewards](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor) though! So that's something to look forward to.
